meanings.definition: A type of immune cell found in tissues
meanings.sent1: The histiocyte helps protect the body from germs.
meanings.sent2: Doctors study histiocytes to understand how the immune system works.
meanings.sent3: The histiocyte decided to throw a party for all the other immune cells.
meanings.sent4: Like tiny soldiers, histiocytes stand guard in the tissues.
meanings.sent5: Imagine histiocytes as tiny superheroes defending the body from invaders.

meanings.definition: A cell that plays a role in the immune response
meanings.sent1: When a germ enters, the histiocyte springs into action.
meanings.sent2: Histiocytes communicate with other cells to fight infections.
meanings.sent3: The histiocyte challenged the virus to a game of tag.
meanings.sent4: In the battle against illness, histiocytes are the frontline warriors.
meanings.sent5: Histiocytes work tirelessly to keep the body healthy and strong.
